translation.home-left-text: Do you have any ideas? Then I will be committed to creating it.
translation.about-left-text: I am an extrovert who loves chess and computers. When programming, I always seek to deliver the best possible experience and visuals to the user. Recently graduated from the Boolean bootcamp, I learned the essentials for creating a web application in its entirety. I've had excellent teamwork experiences and continue to learn more and more every time I meet a new developer.
translation.name: NAME
